item.description:
Really enjoyed this last fall and we have a little more time the dogs can play on the beach....so let's head to the shore and romp in the sand. Because after Memorial Day the beaches will be restricted. So let's get out and have some fun !

After running with the dogs on the beach, we'll head up to Nubble Light House and also to Fox's Lobster House for a little nosh.

They have tables outside where we can eat and share with the dogs !!!

Carpooling from Youville Ball Park off Candia Road in Manchester at 12:45 pm
item.how_to_find_us: Listen for the cute beagle screaming "over here !!! "

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Long Sands Beach, York Maine
